deaths in care homes are not included in

correspondent Allison holt reports at
the castle Troy residential home in
Luton they've now had 13 residents
who've died from coronavirus in recent
days for staff a deeply distressing
fight as they've tried to protect the
older and disabled people they care for
castle Troy staff have been working very
hard to shield residents themselves and
their own families will continue to
provide the care and support needed by
our residents we send our condolences to
the family and friends at this very sad
time because they are our family many
care staff feel the vital role they are
playing in this fight against the virus
is
being largely overlooked in care homes
